title: IHOT 2025 Women's Long Sheer Sleeve Ruched Sheath Bodycon Cocktail Party Work Dress
description: Fabrics: The sexy bodycon dresses is very soft, has some stretchy, breathable, lightweight.
Design: The ruched party dress feature classic long sheer sleeves, ruched body con, side ruffle design, curvy fitting, pencil sheath dress, knee length, back zipper.
Ruching at side slim your waist. Sleeves with lantern design covers your arms and look more sweet. Bodycon dress flattering fit for most women body shapes, make you more sexy but elegant.
Sheer sleeve ruched midi dresses perfect for wedding guest, cocktail party, wear to work, church, club wear, night out, graduation, holiday or other special occasions.
Care: machine wash and hand washing. Do not bleach.
